select report_number,registration_number,policy_number,plate_number,assured,risk_date,case_character,underwriting_code,assessment_loss,insurance_code, insurance_name,damage_code,damage_name,case_station,adjuster_code,adjuster_name from pending_table
case_station <> 4
and area_type is null

SELECT p.report_number,p.registration_number,p.policy_number,p.plate_number,p.assured,p.risk_date,p.case_character,p.underwriting_code,p.assessment_loss,p.insurance_code,p.insurance_name,p.damage_code,p.damage_name,p.adjuster_code,p.adjuster_name,c.case_station_name,g.group_name group_id FROM pending_table as p LEFT JOIN case_table c ON c.id=p.case_station LEFT JOIN group_p g ON g.id=p.group_id
p.case_station <> 4
and (p.damage_name is not null or p.damage_code is not null)
and p.damage_name is null and p.damage_code is null
and p.area_type = #{areaType}

SELECT p.report_number,p.registration_number,p.plate_number,p.case_station FROM (select report_number,registration_number,plate_number,case_character,area_type,group_id,SUBSTRING(underwriting_code,1,6) as institution_code,case_station from pending_table) as p left join (SELECT u.institution_name,u.institution_code FROM institution_table u WHERE institution_code in (610112,610114,610122,610123,610124,610125,610126)) as i on i.institution_code=p.institution_code LEFT JOIN case_table c ON p.case_station=c.id where p.case_station='1' and i.institution_name is null and p.case_character LIKE 'T%' and p.area_type is null

SELECT p.report_number,p.registration_number,p.plate_number,p.case_station,i.institution_name FROM (select report_number,registration_number,plate_number,case_character,area_type,group_id,SUBSTRING(underwriting_code,1,6) as institution_code,case_station from pending_table) as p left join (SELECT u.institution_name,u.institution_code FROM institution_table u WHERE institution_code in (610112,610114,610122,610123,610124,610125,610126)) as i on i.institution_code=p.institution_code LEFT JOIN case_table c ON p.case_station=c.id where i.institution_name is NOT null and p.case_station ='1' and p.area_type is null

SELECT p.report_number,p.registration_number,p.plate_number,p.case_station,u1.group_id FROM (select report_number,registration_number,plate_number,case_character,insurance_code,area_type,group_id,SUBSTRING(underwriting_code,1,6) as institution_code,case_station from pending_table) as p left join (SELECT u.institution_name,u.institution_code FROM institution_table u WHERE institution_code in (610112,610114,610122,610123,610124,610125,610126)) as i on i.institution_code=p.institution_code left join user u1 ON u1.username = p.insurance_code LEFT JOIN case_table c ON c.id = p.case_station where p.case_station='1' and i.institution_name is null and p.case_character = 'L' and u1.group_id in (1,2,3,4,12) and ( u1.role_id=1 or u1.username in (10062054,8031460,61936588)) and p.area_type is null

SELECT p.report_number,p.registration_number,p.plate_number,p.case_station FROM (select report_number,registration_number,plate_number,case_character,area_type,group_id,SUBSTRING(underwriting_code,1,6) as institution_code,case_station from pending_table) as p left join (SELECT u.institution_name,u.institution_code FROM institution_table u WHERE institution_code in (610112,610114,610122,610123,610124,610125,610126)) as i on i.institution_code=p.institution_code LEFT JOIN case_table c ON c.id = p.case_station where i.institution_name is null and p.case_character like 's%' AND p.case_station IN (2,3) and p.area_type is null
